Home.title: I'm <name>Angely</name>, Frontend Developer
Home.recommendation: Angely's frontend development made our website fast, modern, and seamless. Highly recommended!

Services.title: My services
Services.description: I build fast, modern, and adaptable digital experiences. From responsive designs to dynamic React and TypeScript applications, I craft tailored solutions that blend aesthetics, functionality, and performance.

webDesign.title: Responsive web design
webDesign.description: I create websites that adapt to any device, ensuring an optimal user experience.

uiUxDesign.title: Modern UI/UX interfaces
uiUxDesign.description: I design attractive and functional interfaces using technologies such as React, Tailwind and Material UI.

apiIntegration.title: API Integration
apiIntegration.description: I connect web applications to external APIs to improve their functionality and efficiency.

spaApplications.title: SPA applications
spaApplications.description: I develop single-page applications with Next.js and React, delivering fluid and dynamic experiences.

reusableComponents.title: Reusable components
reusableComponents.description: I build modular and reusable components that optimize code scalability and maintainability.

developmentTypescript.title: TypeScript development
developmentTypescript.description: I implement TypeScript to improve code security and ensure better structure in projects.
